casebody.data:
Helen MECCA and Peggy Mecca in their capacity as co-trustees of The Gennaro Mecca Marital Deduction Trust, The Generation Skipping Trust, The Unified Credit Trust, and Helen Mecca, individually, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
Gilbert M. LEVINE and Levine DeSantis, LLC, Defendants-Respondents. C-859 September Term 2018
082380 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 14, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000584-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
